content: अन्वाजे {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [अनु आंजयत्यनेन, अनुआजि-डे <ls>Tv.</ls>] (Used like उपाजे only with कृ) So as to assist or support the weak (दुर्बलस्य बलाधाने); optionally regarded as a preposition; °कृत्य or °कृत्वा supporting, assisting (a weak person); दुर्बलस्य बलमाधाय <ls>P. I. 4. 73</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>
